item.title: Tennis ace turned MP settles legal claim over stories
item.description: <p>Former tennis ace turned Victorian Liberal deputy leader Sam Groth sued the <em>Herald Sun</em> over articles published in late July that focused on when he began his relationship with his wife Brittany.</p>

item.title: Debate over compulsory military service revived in Europe amid Russian threat and NATO defence spending target
item.description: <p>The <a href="https://www.9news.com.au/russia-ukraine" title="Russia-Ukraine" target="_blank" rel="">Russia-Ukraine</a> conflict has triggered several European governments to discuss or reinstate mandatory military service for the first time in decades.</p>

item.title: Donald Trump calls for Seth Meyers to be fired after host described him as 'most unpopular president of all ti
item.description: <p>In a fiery response on Truth Social, Trump accused Seth Meyers of suffering from &quot;an incurable case of Trump Derangement Syndrome (TDS)&quot;.</p>

item.title: Trump pulling out all the stops to welcome Saudi crown prince for first White House visit since Khashoggi kill
item.description: <p>President Donald Trump is planning to receive Saudi Arabia&#x27;s powerful Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman at the White House this week with all the trappings of a state visit, sources familiar with the matter said, including a welcome ceremony in the morning and a formal dinner in the evening.</p>

item.title: Key date for Lehrmann rape trial finally to be revealed
item.description: <p>Former political staffer Bruce Lehrmann&#x27;s court bid to avoid facing a rape trial will likely be heard more than three years after the charges were filed.</p>
